action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Rome
TO: Athens
BY: Boat
CLASS: Economy
WHEN: In ten days

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the travel agent been informed about your place of departure? Please answer yes or no.

<|assistant|>
ANSWER: No, the travel agent has not been informed about my place of departure yet.

ASIDE: I will provide the travel agent with the necessary information.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Has the travel agent been informed about your place of departure? Please answer yes or no.

<|assistant|>
ANSWER: No, the travel agent has not been informed about my place of departure.

ASIDE: I am planning to travel from Rome to Athens in ten days by boat in economy class.
NA

<|assistant|>
ANSWER: No, the travel agent has not been informed about my place of departure.

ASIDE: I will provide the travel agent with the necessary information.
